00100 void SVG::Canvas::initCanvas(void) 
00101 {
00102     try {
00103         // construct new canvas message
00104         ostringstream lStream;
00105         lStream << "NEWW        ";
00106         write(lStream);
00107         // send message
00108         sendMessage(lStream.str());
00109         // save window id
00110         receiveMessage(mWinID);
00111         // close viewer connection
00112         close();
00113     } catch(const Socket::Exception& inErr) {
00114         cerr << inErr.getMessage() << endl;
00115     }
00116 }
00117 
00119 void SVG::Canvas::updateViewer(void)
00120 {
00121     try {
00122         // reconnect to viewer
00123         connect(std::string("localhost:61250"));
00124         // construct update message
00125         ostringstream lStream;
00126         lStream << "REFR" << mWinID;
00127         write(lStream);
00128         // send message
00129         sendMessage(lStream.str());
00130         // close connection
00131         close();
00132     } catch(const Socket::Exception& inErr) {
00133         cerr << inErr.getMessage() << endl;
00134     }
00135 }
00136 
00138 SVG::Point SVG::Canvas::waitForClick(int& outButtonClicked, double inMaxDelay)
00139 {
00140     ostringstream lOutStream;
00141     lOutStream << "GCLK" << mWinID;
00142     sendMessage(lOutStream.str());
00143     string lMessage;
00144     receiveMessage(lMessage);
00145     Point lPos;
00146     istringstream lInStream(lMessage);
00147     lInStream >> lPos.x >> lPos.y >> outButtonClicked;
00148     lPos.y = getSize().height - lPos.y;
00149     return lPos;
00150 }
